question: Which is Indiaâ€™s first gas exchange to be authorised by Petroleum and Natural Gas Regulatory Board?
option3: India Shale and Natural Gas Exchange
explanation:
India Gas Exchange (IGX) is a wholly-owned subsidiary of the Indian Energy Exchange (IEX). It is the first gas exchange in the country to be authorised from Petroleum and Natural Gas Regulatory Board (PNGRB) under Gas Exchange Regulations 2020
Adani Total Gas and Torrent Gas have recently acquired five percent equity stake each in Indian Gas Exchange (IGX).
